website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Zig Pulse 3 is a road running shoe designed for neutral runners.  The shoe was mostly developed for active walking and low-mileage runs.  The Zig Pulse 3 has an innovative ZigTech outsole that enhances cushioning for a better comfortable ride.  It also has a two-tone mesh upper that is responsible for making the shoes well ventilated and breathable. Most runners like these features of Reebok Zig Pulse 3 but then again, some few purchasers were put off by the shoe’s durability.  Despite the naysayers, the Reebok Zig Pulse 3 still holds its own when it comes to its positive reviews, and most users still choose it because of the comfort it provides whether used at the gym or out on the track.
pros: A lot of users have noted that the Reebok Zig Pulse 3 provides excellent comfort during their runs
Most wearers like the invigorating design update that the shoe went through
Some users said that the Zig Pulse 3’s upper is well ventilated
A fair number of purchasers mentioned how they appreciated the energy return provided by ZigTech technology
The shoe's performance and support are consistent even with everyday use, several runners noted
cons: A couple of users questioned the build quality of the Reebok Zig Pulse 3
The outsole has quickly worn apart after only a couple of uses, according to some wearers

customer_reviews.title: Did not find the shoes incredibly comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Fit seemed to be spot on with other Reebok and Puma shoes. Did not find the shoes incredibly comfortable... but also was only wearing them for an hour at a time for the gym. I didn't have any issues, but i could imagine a distance runner mayhave issue with their stiffness and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: ReeBok Zigs
customer_reviews.text: This particular style of the Zigs, is okay. I ordered this pair because the ones I wanted were not in-stock. They are very comfortable, but I don't like the mesh fabric that the housing is composed of. After a couple of weeks some of the rubber pieces on the bottom of the sole started coming off and I had to apply some super glue in order to reapply them. Zigs is still my favorite running shoe, but the next time I will get the ones that are more durable, I have an old pair that I have had since 2012 and they are still in pretty good condition, and still can be used.
customer_reviews.author: rodney chatman

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe for this nurse
customer_reviews.text: I love Reezigs. They're the best shoe for my feet. I work as an RN and for me these are the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. I used to wear Shox and Air, even UA, Brooks, and Saucony. Reebok's are my favorite by far.
customer_reviews.author: BraddyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look and feel great but the toe of the sole cane off the second time I wore them. I almost fell down. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: steelersfan12

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes if you work on your feet
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears these every day for work which is always walking a lot, and will now only wear these. I'm sure it's personal preference (he has narrow to moderate feet) they're comfortable, the soles are very durable, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best value running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I've had Zigtech shoes before and they ran a little big, so this time I bought a half size smaller. Reebok Zigtech shoes are the most comfortable running shoes in my opinion, and you cant beat the price! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: amazonfan808

customer_reviews.title: A Real Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I have been running trails in this shoe for 7 months. This shoe wears well and really is showing little wear. I should be replacing it but they look and feel good.
customer_reviews.author: J.Pawlak

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve purchased shoes online but I knew my size and didn’t want to go on a local hunt for this older style shoe. These shoes have held up very well. I’m on my feet for 8 hours a day walking around on a concrete factory floor and these are the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever had for work!! They hold up well under daily use. Would totally recommend these for a comfortable shoe that’s actually holds up!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: ran a little big but super comfort
customer_reviews.text: got these for my hubby - he works on his feet all day and he loves these so far the best work shoes he had !!!! they ran a little big but nothing crazy good for wide feet we live in a hot area and keeps his feet alot cooler than typical sneakers
customer_reviews.author: alexandra s.

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. I would get a half size bigger to make it true to fit but great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: But these you won't be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes!!! Feel great on my feet and they are very light but have great support for your feet. They seem to be a hair pin loose but I like them that way.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: A half size larger would have made all the difference.
customer_reviews.text: Love the styling but was unhappy that the sizes did not include 14-1/2 or 15 which would have been more comfortable. Had to settle for size 14.
customer_reviews.author: "baghdadyelie"

customer_reviews.title: Compliments
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was searching for. I had to buy men’s because this color was not available in women’s.
customer_reviews.author: CatinaSue

customer_reviews.title: Superb Comfort
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate comfort fit tennis shoes. The fit is just superior to others on the market. So so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Mautz

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Zigtechs and wish Reebok would return to there original style.
customer_reviews.author: TNT

customer_reviews.title: FALLS APART AFTER 2 WEEKS
customer_reviews.text: This shoe arrived fine, but after wearing it for 2 weeks, the bottoms fell apart!
customer_reviews.author: MeredithH

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best shoes I have ever had. takes a week to break in then they are amazing! I hope they never stop making these I am on my 4th pair and I love them!! Super comfortable no more heel pain or back pain! they are a life saver for someone like me whom is on there feet all day.thank you Reebok!!
customer_reviews.author: Dion Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fit , Comfort, Durability, and how well a product is manufactured.
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for walking. The reports from previous consumers suggested these shoes may fall apart so I am skeptical about the durability of this shoe. I've worn twice, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: High arch for a normal foot. Stiff
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice shoe. Fits a little different. Stiff. High arch.
customer_reviews.author: Shonda Ashworth

customer_reviews.title: Sole comes unglued at toe.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. I have ordered this shoe before, however the sole on the previous pair came unglued at the toe with little wear. I've noticed this on one other Reebok Classic shoes I have ordered for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Marin me.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shoes for my husband as a gift and he loved them. Even after our puppy got to them, they are still wearable! According to my husband, they are very comfortable and as we have dealt with, very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great look and feel
customer_reviews.text: Zigzags are great. I love the feel and the look. The only con is that they can track more rocks and mud, but still worth it :)
customer_reviews.author: brian allen

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish. Great fit. I normally need a wide size in new balance and Nike. These are my play shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jermans

customer_reviews.title: Look sharp get a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of shoes I ever owned. Quality comfort and light weight
customer_reviews.author: Robert Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The soles are starting to come apart after 35 days can't return because over 5 days on return policy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes. Good for running or working out
customer_reviews.text: They’re super comfy and they’re an upgrade from the last ones I had. They have the extra heel support when running and very nice for the gym too
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Theses sneakers are pretty good for working out. There light and comfortable. Not much for style outside the gym though.. overall a solid 4 star sneaker ( out of 5).
customer_reviews.author: great app

customer_reviews.title: Fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I already have a pair I use to referee win . I find them very comfortable and gives me support
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love them so far had them for 2 weeks. Wear them at work for 8hrs on concrete and my feet still feel great afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: they don't last
customer_reviews.text: I've had these shoes about a month and the bottom track is already peeling off!!! Of course to late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Yves C. Lamothe

customer_reviews.title: Great to work out in!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for these for a minute. They’re the Best! Gonna order Me another Pair!
customer_reviews.author: Walter Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Built so you can go the distance
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are excellent for all day standing and walking your feet don’t hurt as much in a full day of work
customer_reviews.author: Abraham G.

customer_reviews.title: Luvem
customer_reviews.text: I own many zigtech. Great shoes. Comfy and last long.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: WORST QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: THE SOLE OF THE TENNIS IS REMOVED WITH LITTLE USE AND EASILY. DO NOT BUY THESE BAD QUALITY TENNIS.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mendez Alfaro.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Durable Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I remember wearing these originally around 2010. They were comfortable, stylish, and resilient. Reebok makes some quality products, and this is one of them. They fit well (advertised shoe size is accurate) and have durable material where the shoes may occasionally drag against the pavement. Just be aware that this shoe will make you about 2 inches taller. 7 years later I'm glad these shoes are still on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Nejy

customer_reviews.title: Love them but piece of sole off
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Helps w my shin splints. However a piece of the rubber from the sole came off and im returning for a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sells

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and look great on my feet with jeans and slacks.
customer_reviews.author: kathlyn b

customer_reviews.title: The shoe fit and feel good.
customer_reviews.text: The Reebok Zig Pulse 3.0 fit good. Real nice and look good running.
customer_reviews.author: johnny chattman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and fit perfectly for the size, good quality that last. My first pair lasted over a year, this pair in hoping to match or exceed that.
customer_reviews.author: A1C A.

customer_reviews.title: Zigs are awesome for heavy guys!!!
customer_reviews.text: Zigs are about the only kind of shoes that I can wear. I am a heavyset guy with bad back, knees, and ankles. This cushions my feet well and tends to keep the shock off of my joints as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sherman

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Zig Pulse 3.0 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Reebok was founded for one of the best reasons possible: athletes wanted to run faster. So in the 1890s, joseph william Foster made some of the first known running shoes with spikes in them. By 1895, he was in business making shoes by hand for top runners; and before long his fledgling company, j.W. Foster and sons, developed an international clientele of distinguished athletes.
